item.title: Gorilla Supply 1000 Dog Poop Waste Bags with Dispenser and Leash Tie, Eco-friendly, Leak-Proof, Water-Proof, Durable and Strong, Unscented, EPI technology, BPA free, 9X13inch, 1000 Count

Additionally, we created true Zero Waste through coreless rolls and recyclable packaging. We strive for a better environment for you and your dog to live ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:22 UTC – Details)



REAL ZERO WASTE: Gorilla poop bags only take 12-36 months to begin breaking down under sunlight by EPI technology and are ASTM D6954 certified. Additionally, we created true Zero Waste through coreless rolls and recyclable packaging. We strive for a better environment for you and your dog to live in.
LEAKPROOF & DURABLE: Our extra thick and sturdy unscented poop bags are strong enough to pick up your dog’s poop without the risk of tearing. Keep your hands clean and away from bad smells with 100% waterproof materials. Our bags are designed to lock away odors and guarantee a mess-free leakproof seal.
RELIABLE US COMPANY: We are an Illinois based small business that loves doggies. Customer satisfaction is always our first priority, and the customer trust we have built up over the years will prove this. We continue to strive to provide the best quality at an affordable price. Don’t hesitate to send us your feedback by message.
SUPER VALUE PACK: Great price for 1000 count poop bags (50 rolls with 20 bags per roll) with 1 bone shaped patented dispenser. A value package is sufficient for more than a year’s use. Our pet waste bag is designed for your convenience. Each large pet waste bag measures 9 X 13 inches, that is enough capacity for all sizes dogs and cats. SAVE UP TO 10% with Subscribe & Save.

4.5
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:22 UTC – Details)

Forblader Super long 403ft 1000 LED Christmas lights to brighten up your Christmas tree, porch, yard, garden, patios, bushes, fences, bedroom railings, Christmas, holidays, weddings, valentine‚Äôs Day, New Year, Thanksgiving, parties houses, exterior, and indoors. etc.

Features:

No Need To extend! One Set Is Enough!

‚ÄîSuper Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

‚Äî8 Lighting Modes: (1. Combination, 2. In waves, 3. Sequential, 4. Slo-Glo, 5. Chasing/flash, 6. Slow fade, 7. Twinkle/flash, 8. Steady on). From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

‚Äî 4 Brightness Levels, Press DIM+/Dim- via the remote controller to adjust brightness level ( 100% 75% 50% 25%).

‚ÄîTimer Function,6H on, 18H off automatically, conveniently, energy-saving, and environmentally friendly. Through the timer setting, it would light up on time every day. 

‚ÄîMemory Function, Built-in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset every day.

‚ÄîSafe to Touch,Come with UL588 certified & a 29V low voltage power plug. Safer and has Less power consumption.

‚ÄîIP44 Waterproof perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.

Specifications:

Material:Copper + Plastic

Total Length: 403ft

LED light Length: 394ft/1000LED

Lead Length: 9.84ft

Color: 5600K Warm White

Waterproof Grade: IP44

Output: 29V Low Voltage

Maximum Remote Control Distance: 8m (26ft)

Package Includes:

1 x 1000 LED Xmas String Lights

1 x Remote Control

1 x Plug

1 x User Manual
„ÄêWarm White Color Changing & 8 Lighting Modes and Remote Control„ÄëIncluding (1.Combination, 2.In waves, 3.Sequential, 4.Slo-glo,5.Chasing/flash, 6.Slow fade, 7.Twinkle/flash, 8.Steady on). Both the remote control and the controller can switch modes, easy to control. „ÄêIP44 WATERPROOF OUTDOORS„ÄëPerfect for outdoor using without any damage, including heavy rain and snow. Tips: Please note that the US-Plug is NOT waterproof, please keep it away from water.
„Äê4 Brightness Levels & Timer Setting & Memory Function„ÄëOur Christmas Lights have 100%-75%-50%-25% 4 level brightness to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. A built-in memory chip of Christmas lights indoor & outdoor will save your last time setting,no need to reset everyday.
„ÄêSafety UL Certified Plug & Easy To Shape„ÄëUL588 certified and 12V low-voltage and 29V DC Output makes the Christmas string lights more safe and reliable for chridren and pet, and Made by high-quality copper wire,These outdoor string lights won’t cause overheating, won’t be hot-to-the-touch during extended usage, and they consume less energy, making them the top environmental and money saving choice of Lights!
„ÄêWhat You Get & Quality Assurance„Äë1 x 1000 LED SUPER long string light, 1x Remote Control(include battery), 1 x User Manual and our professional & kind service include a 1-year replacement. If the product has manufacturing defects, please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us, We will do our best to help you to solve it.

Super long 1000 LED Christmas String Lights

Safe to Touch & IP44 Waterproof

Timer & Memory Function

Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. Built in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset everyday.

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

WIRED ETHERNET PORT: Simply plug in game consoles, streaming players, or other nearby wired devices using the one 10/100M port for maximum speed.
SAFE & SECURE: Supports WEP and WPA/WPA2 wireless security protocols.
SIMPLE TO SETUP: Press the WPS button to connect to your router. Use the NETGEAR WiFi Analyzer app for optimal location.

The VTech VG101-11 Cordless Phone comes equipped with all the essential features for the perfect home phone system. DECT 6.0 enables long range and clear sounds. Backlit display and keypad for better visibility. The cordless handset has built-in full-duplex speakerphone, one-touch volume control / mute / redial / flash button. Easy access to phonebook & logs for quick calls. Wall-mountable with built-in mounting holes.
[DECT 6.0 enables Long Range & Clear Sound] – Trusted by families worldwide for decades, VTech’ s cordless telephone transmits secure signals via DECT 6.0 channel ensures crystal clear sounds, interference-free, and stable operation range up to 1000 ft outdoor.
[Backlit Display & Keypad for Better Visibility] – Blue-white backlit display and green backlit keypad for easier viewing and dialing in dim light. Handset displays the name, number, time and date of incoming calls.
[Speak & Hear simultaneously with Full-Duplex Speakerphone] – Full-duplex handset speakerphone. Enjoy a speakerphone that can keep up with your calls. Increase participation by allowing both ends to speak – and be heard – at the same time for conversations that are more true to life.
[Easy access to essential feature[Access phonebook & logs for quick calls] – 30 names and numbers phonebook directory. 20 names and numbers caller ID records. 5 last called number records.s] – One-touch volume control and mute button. You can silence your phone for a single call or for an extended period of time. When set to Quiet Mode, the handset and base ringers are disabled, so you’ll have one fewer interruptions in your busy home.
[Easy Wall Mount] – Easy-to-Use wall mount capability – The base mounts easily to all of the standard wall mount plates. No additional bracket needed. Simply slide the base unit into the mounting plate using the built-in mounting holes.

Read more

Read more

Easy features you’ll love!

The LCD and keypad illuminate, allowing for easier viewing in dim light.

See who is calling with caller ID / call waiting. The handset displays the name, number, time, and date of incoming calls.

Easy access to up to 30 stored names and numbers.

Easy hands-free calls at the touch of a button, allows you to make or receive a call without having to hold the cordless handset.

Read more

Volume buttons on the handset let you easily adjust the incoming call’s volume.

Works with Hearing aid.

Easy for installation.

Compact design fits easily into your home space.

Face off against your friends and family in this high-octane sports trivia game! Draft sports categories you know you can dominate, or risk playing outside your comfort zone to net the big score. If you dropped the ball on your last answer, recover points in the active Instant Replay challenges. Outscore the opposing team or meet them in Sudden Death to decide the winner!
1,000 sports questions to challenge your friends and family
Score bonus points with exciting mini-sports dexterity challenges!
Team play lets you combine your knowledge!
Use strategy to draft the trivia categories your team needs to score
A great addition to your pre-game party or tailgating fun!
The ultimate sports trivia game ‚Äî a must have for sports fans!
Ages 10 and up

Read more

At the end of the day, we‚Äôre all fans. Now it‚Äôs time to put YOUR fandom to the test with ESPN Trivia Night. Pick your team and draft sports categories you can dominate. Or risk playing outside your comfort zone to net the big win!

Face off against your friends and family in this high-octane sports trivia game with 1,000 sports trivia questions covering baseball, football, basketball, Ice Hockey, logos, mascots and more!

Miss a question? Recover lost points in exciting mini-sports Instant Replay challenges. Outscore the opposing team or meet them in Sudden Death to decide the winner!
